net.sourceforge.metrics.builder
Class MetricsBuilder.MetricsBuildVisitor

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metrics.builder.MetricsBuilder.MetricsBuildVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceDeltaVisitor, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceVisitor
Enclosing class:
MetricsBuilder
class MetricsBuilder.MetricsBuildVisitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceVisitor, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceDeltaVisitor

implements both the ResourceVisitor for a full build and the DeltaVisitor for an incremental build. pushes commands on a stack so that they get executed in a depth first order.

Author:
Frank Sauer
